Title: The Global Warming Reader: A Century of Writing About Climate Change
Author: Bill McKibben
Publisher: Penguin Books

This torrent is a Calibre compatible folder that can be directly inserted into your Calibre library folder. It has a .pdf,.epub, and .azw3 (native format) available, alongside metadata and cover picture.

If you don't like the formatting on the .pdf and .epub, you can change them using Calibre's conversion format using the .azw3 file.
